node.html:
• Building modern energy management platform for renewable assets
  • Our vision is to build the best energy mangement platform for new age sustainable technologies and RE100 world

• Building cohort-based learning Ed-tech platform to fundamentally change education online, primarily focused in architecture and design.
  • We believe with right teaching and mentorship, we can positively change lives of many.
  • Serving everyone in need with the use of cutting-edge and leading technologies.

• Worked with International team and built and launched trainer led Cure.Fit application.
  • Worked on various Eat.fit microservices (mostly on NodeJs and Java) serving 30k+ orders per day
  • Worked on Eat.fit user personalisation engine with efficiently sustaining high load and A/B testing functionality
  • Worked on tech stack using Jenkins, Kubernetes, Mongo DB, Mysql and various AWS services

• Built end to end models and automated data pipeline for daily Eat.fit food demand prediction across 50+ kitchens and 5k SKUs, achieving error (MAPE) of <25%
  • Worked on various statistical models such as SARIMA, LSTM and Logistic regression
  • Build the prediction deployment stack from scratch, using Jenkins, Docker swarm and Apache airflow
  • Worked on data aggregation pipelines for Eat.fit food recommendations on Apache spark
• Worked on parameterized algorithms on k path vertex cover problem

• Full stack development of a web application on spring MVC architecture on Spring Boot and JSP.
  • The application assisted QA team to automate and track their testing pipelines
